game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an epic quest to find the lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Follow the clues and brave the dangers that await you in this exciting adventure.

task.description: Brave the dangerous jungle and avoid deadly creatures to reach your destination.
